results.title: Amlodipine Overdose in a Transgender Woman: A Case Study
results.text_hl: We present a case of a 43-year-old transgender @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ who presented with @DISEASE_Hypotension @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotension@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@ owing to @DISEASE_Drug_Overdose @DISEASE_MESH:D062787 @@@drug overdose@@@ that was later confirmed to be @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@.

citations.NLM: Bojja S, Javed N, Bojja S, Itare V, Nasr R. Amlodipine Overdose in a Transgender Woman: A Case Study Cureus. 2023 Jul;15(7):e42511. PMID: 37637641

results.title: Therapeutic Usefulness of a Novel Calcium Channel Blocker Azelnidipine in the Treatment of Hypertension: A Narrative Review
results.text_hl: In clinical practice, earlier-generation CCBs such as @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ are associated with adverse events, including reflex @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@ and @DISEASE_Edema @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@pedal edema@@@.

citations.NLM: Ram CVS. Therapeutic Usefulness of a Novel Calcium Channel Blocker Azelnidipine in the Treatment of Hypertension: A Narrative Review Cardiol Ther. 2022 Dec;11(4):473-489. PMID: 35969319

results.title: A survival case of high-dose amlodipine intoxication with non-cardiogenic pulmonary edema: a case report.
results.text_hl: Case presentation: The authors present a case of a 21-year-old male with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ intoxication with 43 tabs of 10 mg (total of 430 mg) ingestion manifested by @DISEASE_Unconsciousness @DISEASE_MESH:D014474 @@@loss of consciousness@@@, @DISEASE_Hypotension @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotension@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@, and @DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@respiratory distress@@@.

citations.NLM: Pant P, Shah S, Bhattarai G, Dahal K, Bista NR, Bade S, Chapagain K, Bade S, Pant S. A survival case of high-dose amlodipine intoxication with non-cardiogenic pulmonary edema: a case report. Ann Med Surg (Lond). 2024 Nov;86(11):6689-6692. PMID: 39525708
citations.BibTeX: @article{39525708, title={A survival case of high-dose amlodipine intoxication with non-cardiogenic pulmonary edema: a case report.}, author={Pant P and Shah S and Bhattarai G and Dahal K and Bista NR and Bade S and Chapagain K and Bade S and Pant S}, journal={Ann Med Surg (Lond)}, volume={86}, number={11}, pages={6689-6692}}

results.title: Preoperative Amlodipine Is Efficacious in Preventing Intraoperative HDI in Pheochromocytoma: Pilot RCT.
results.text_hl: The drug-related adverse effects were @DISEASE_Edema @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@pedal edema@@@ (1 in @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@), @DISEASE_Dizziness @DISEASE_MESH:D004244 @@@dizziness@@@ (1 in @CHEMICAL_Prazosin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011224 @@@prazosin@@@ GITS), and @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@ (6 in @CHEMICAL_Prazosin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011224 @@@prazosin@@@ GITS and 3 in @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@).

citations.NLM: Jaiswal SK, Memon SS, Lila A, Sarathi V, Goroshi M, Garg R, Barnabas R, Hemantkumar I, Patel RD, Oak S, Dalvi A, Garale M, Patil V, Shah NS, Bandgar T. Preoperative Amlodipine Is Efficacious in Preventing Intraoperative HDI in Pheochromocytoma: Pilot RCT. J Clin Endocrinol Metab. 2021 Jul 13;106(8):e2907-e2918. PMID: 33839787

results.title: Amlodipine versus Nifedipine ER for the Management of Postpartum Hypertension: A Noninferiority Randomized Controlled Trial.
results.text_hl: There were no differences in use of additional antihypertensives or @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@-reported side effects or breastfeeding outcomes, but @DISEASE_Hypotension @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotension@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@ were less common with @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ use.

citations.NLM: Pratt K, Lordo R, Self S, Carlson L. Amlodipine versus Nifedipine ER for the Management of Postpartum Hypertension: A Noninferiority Randomized Controlled Trial. Am J Obstet Gynecol MFM. 2024 Dec 9;():101575. PMID: 39662698

results.title: Amlodipine: pharmacokinetic profile of a low-clearance calcium antagonist.
results.text_hl: The pharmacokinetic properties of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ avoid the sharp fluctuations in plasma level seen with other calcium antagonists that are associated with vasodilatation-induced side effects such as @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@, @DISEASE_Headache @DISEASE_MESH:D006261 @@@headache@@@, and @DISEASE_Flushing @DISEASE_MESH:D005483 @@@flushing@@@.

citations.NLM: Abernethy DR. Amlodipine: pharmacokinetic profile of a low-clearance calcium antagonist. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1991;17 Suppl 1():S4-7. PMID: 16296697
citations.BibTeX: @article{16296697, title={Amlodipine: pharmacokinetic profile of a low-clearance calcium antagonist.}, author={Abernethy DR}, journal={J Cardiovasc Pharmacol}, volume={17 Suppl 1}, pages={S4-7}}

results.title: Amlodipine fatality in an infant with postmortem blood levels.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@Toxic effects@@@ reported from @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ include @DISEASE_Hypotension @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotension@@@, reflex @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@, @DISEASE_Acidosis @DISEASE_MESH:D000138 @@@metabolic acidosis@@@, and @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Edema @DISEASE_MESH:D011654 @@@pulmonary edema@@@.
